title: Firefox version 78 y posteriores cambian valores predeterminados en drives de impresora windows
content:
Buenas tardes

Gusto en saludar, tengo un problema con la versión Firefox 78.0.2 cuando lo utilizo en un sistema web en la cual imprime etiquetas en impresora zt230 zebra resulta que este me cambia los formatos del tamaño de la etiqueta definidos y predeterminados en windows a través de su driver {Tamaño : altura 8 cm, ; ancho : 10 cm} lamentablemente cuando tengo que usar mozilla firefox en el sistema web y necesito imprimir aquellas etiquetas me cambia aquellas configuraciones automáticamente lo cual me impide imprimir de forma correcta las etiquetas. 

En todas las versiones de firefox pasa lo mismo pero a diferencias de las versiones anteriores a la 78 tenia la posibilidad de cambiar ese valor en el cuadro de dialogo de imprimir - preferencias y colocar los parámetros nuevamente y mientras estaba en la sesión del sistema web mantenía los margenes modificados, ahora la version 78 no los guarda y por ende se deben cambiar constantemente haciendo el proceso de imprimir etiquetas se vuelva mas lento cuanto tengo un volumen de etiquetas a imprimir por cada registro.

Se adjunta imágenes sobre la problemática, ¿Como poder solucionar este tema ? ¿Podrán corregir esto para que Firefox obtenga los datos predeterminados del drivers en windows (impresora) sin que este lo modifique automáticamente ?. De ante mano muchas gracias Saluda atte, Carlos Gómez R. mail: carlosgomezr0980@gmail.com
creator: carlosgomezr

title: How to launch firefox automatically in LOW PRIORITY
content:
How to launch firefox automatically in LOW PRIORITY? Before, it was not complicated with a single optimized process. But for a year now, Firefox has been configured in relation to Gaming PCs with 8-16GB of RAM, 4K video and Games which uses PNG of 4MB in animation. It is almost a luxury to be able to use several software at the same time (photoshop, windows, firefox ...). And I'm not talking about all the crap associated with protecting flouted data.

NOTA: Your single process option does not work: it already generates 6 which are not optimized. When you delete the biggest one, all the others close. So I don't see the point of this configuration.

title: Container
content:
Hello

Why is dealing with container is so hard? I mean it's like peoples who design it don't use it, there is a lot of design flaw in it (like when it ask wich container to use but you can't select no container so firefox will purposelessly force you to be tracked by Google or Facebook, it make no sense at all).

And more globally, firefox brag to be about privacy, but for the end user like me there is to much design error to make it easy to use (we can't make inactive an extension from the browser, we always have to go to these menus it's really boring and in the end you stop using privacy module because of this)

I think Firefox should not be about privacy on paper only but really designed to be practical about privacy and I think it's not going good and most peoples will end to don't care about privacy because of this (and switch to chrome or else).

Oh and I will be pleased to help and give more detailed informations about all those design problems, and how they occur, to fix them and improve Fx.

But I won't continue to use Fx is the main reason to use it now : the privacy settings, are not easily usable in everyday's life.

Regards

title: dont know anything about browsers but firefox please give my priceless photos back!
content: ok so i just started using firefox for my browser or duck go or something, the settings were default, i think its responsible for deleting all of my walmart.photos!? can they restore them? i i -I dont know how to communicate this way...i cant contact a person...but can i ask a tech or community person to please contact me?! how devastated i am... i had hundreds of images/photos/jpeg or whatever..stored in walmart.com photo center software!! and i login just scroll through them @ the end of june..ill get exact dates/anything if someone can will HELP ME walk me through it this is so confusing! Anyway...i dont recall much about the day..except on the photo site in june just for, a very short time, hour tops...photos -logged off & shut down -traveled out of town 11 hours to visit with family...came back..turned on my windows 7 hp desktop pc...@july 9 went to walmart website ....NO PHOTOS! it said i had No photos!! i have had those there for 6years! i called them first naturally, i hoped it was them becuz maybe they had a way to restore..but this is so imoportant ..i used mouse to explore firefox menu icons,and noticed all these addons i guess or a cookies cleaner or something...and It hit me! there were 217 ?cleaned' 'cookies' logs with walmart tag-walmar!! i feel like some might say, to accept the loss!! --i have a lil despair knowing no live rep..or programmer there has to be connection ,, ive been loosing sleep over this i dont know where to start please im asking for resources. ideas. thank you so much ,i know i may sound like a hassle.i just still in shock .but if any information direction.. , bad news even..is appreciated.

Interestingly, if I paste the link to the installation file into VirusTotal - there are no surprises. What is going on?
creator: lucas11

title: Firefox 78 slow download after win 10 july update
content:
Firefox 78.0.2 win 10 2004 / 19041.388 Device Security / Core Isolation / Memory Integrity = ON Win 10 July Update KB4565627 & KB4565503

Testing using https://www.xfinityspeedtest.org Similar results with https://tesymy.net

Before this update Firefox / Chrome / Edge all reported approximately the same download speed. ~500Mb After the update Chrome & Edge still report similar download speed ~500 Mb but Firefox is about half. ~270Mb

Upload seems to be unchanged at ~17Mb.

If I turn Memory Integrity off, Fire Fox download returns to previous operation.

So far only Fire Fox seems to be impacted by these changes.
creator: paulf1801

title: Transfering Firefox to new computer
content: I just bought a new computer and would like to transfer everything from firefox to the new pc. My old computer is near death, mostly running on safe mode, is it possible to move everything? I have copied over the cert9.db chromeappstore, content-prefs cookies favicaons formhistory handlers key4.db logins, permissions persdict places sessionstore webappstore signons bookmarkbackups, chrome searchplugins sessionstore-backups...... I pasted into profiles folder but nothing is showing up... Help would be much appreciated

title: Search bar/Address bar Not Working
content:
Starting yesterday, I noticed my search/address bar no longer works right. When I type a search term or web address into the bar and hit the enter key, nothing happens. Nothing happens when I click the "go" arrow on the righthand edge of the bar either.

When I first click on the bar, a menu pops up below it and one of the options is "search with Google". If I click this option, it puts @google at the beginning of the bar, and search works just fine. But this extra step is irritating, and it doesn't work to take me directly to a website. For example to get to Pinterest, instead of typing pinterest.com in the bar and going directly there, I have to type "@google pinterest", and click on the first search result.

I read some past topics addressing this question, and have tried clearing my cache, refreshing Firefox, and restarting Firefox in SafeMode. None of these have helped (and even in SafeMode I still had the same problem). Any other suggestions would be much appreciated.
creator: ritanichols75

title: Firefox says only one "copy" can run at a time
content: I have 2 user accounts on my Mac, only one of which I really use. (Firefox works fine when I'm on the other user, but it doesn't have all my bookmarks, passwords, etc... not to mention I can't access the non-Firefox files I want.) How do I close or get rid of the extra copy, so I can use Firefox in the other user account? Quitting the app doesn't do it.
